title: Textile, 1930
medium:
Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: a) Row of medium-sized floral sprigs alternating with group of four rows of large, widely spaced coin-sized dots, brocaded in white cotton on sheer undyed piña cloth ground, in which coarse screen effect is obtained by grouping five warps closely, alternating with isolated single one; wefts same. Two plain selvages. Purchased in a Manila market.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1930.
1930. Medium: piña (pineapple) fiber, cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-85-a.
